itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Black Stone Crystal that can be fused into Armor sockets. 
- Item effect: Maximum HP +100 & Weight Limit +20LT & Extra Damage against Humans +2
※ Once installed, the crystal might be destroyed upon the character's death.
- The potential of the crystal can be transfused to equipment items through Black Spirit.
- How to Obtain: Heat the Red Essence and Ancient Magic Crystal: Cobelinus together.

item.name: Red Essence
item.desc: The concentrated essence of red blood.\nWhen heated with Ancient Magic Crystal : Power and Ancient Magic Crystal : Adamantine to obtain an awakened crystal.
